original_text: Now before faith came, we were held captive under the law, imprisoned until the coming faith would be revealed.
korean_text: 믿음이 오기 전에 우리는 율법 아래에 매인 바 되고 계시될 믿음의 때까지 갇혔느니라

sentences.original_text: we were held captive under the law,
imprisoned until the coming faith would be revealed.
sentences.korean_translation: 장차 올 믿음이 계시될 때까지 감금되었습니다.
